title.narrative: Training seminar on the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea

description.narrative:
The Embassy of Denmark will offer funding for three (03) officials of the MOFA (Department of International Laws and Treaties, National Borders Committee and Diplomatic Academy of Vietnam) to attend an International Expert Seminar on Continental Shelf. The seminar is organised by the Summer Accademy on the Continental Shelf from 19 to 25 June 2016 in Faroe Islands, Denmark.
This activity is expected to further exchanges on regional and global issues in accordance with the Viet Nam - Denmark Comprehensive Partnership Agreement, underpinning the mutual interest in resolving maritime and territorial disputes on the basis of international law.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
